title: SB 1.18.6 | HH Stoka Krishna Swami | 28-03-2023 | Daily Evening Bhagavatam Discourse
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.text: Om Agyana Timiraandhasya Gyananjanishalakaya
Chakshurun Meelitam Yena Tasmai Shri Gurave Namaha
Nama Om Vishnupadaya Krishna Preshtaya Bhutale
Shri Mate Bhaktivedanta Swamin Nithinamine
Namaste Saraswate Deve Gauravani Pracharine
Nirvishesha Shunyavadi Pashchatya Deshatarine
Jaya Shri Krishna Chaitanya Prabhu Nithyananda
Shri Advaita Ganadhara Shiva Sadhi Gauravakta Vrinda
Hare Krishna Hare Krishna Krishna Krishna Hare Hare
Hare Rama Hare Rama Rama Rama Hare Hare
Om Namo Bhagavate Vasudevaya Narayanam Namaskritya
Naram Chai Vanarottamam Deveem Saraswateem
Vyasam Tato Jayam Udi Rayet
In this session we will be discussing from the 6th verse of the 18th chapter of the 1st canto of Srimad Bhagavatam
Yasmin Ahani Yarkhyeva Bhagavan Utsasarjagam
Tadai Vehanu Vrittosav Adharma Prabhavak Kadihi
The meaning of this 6th verse is
The very day and moment the personality of Godhead Lord Sri Krishna left this earth
The personality of Kali who promotes all kinds of irreligious activities came into this world
So this verse follows the previous verse which described that
Kali entered this earth planet long before Parikshit Maharaj started ruling
That is
Krishna
Krishna's disappearance
At the end of Dwapar Yuga
Krishna's disappearance
Then the Pandavas
Learned about that and then they retired
And they handed over charge of ruling the
Entire earth planet to Parikshit Maharaj
Then Parikshit Maharaj began ruling
And
While he was storing his kingdom
He came across this personality of Kali
Kali was trying to enter his kingdom
But Parikshit Maharaj stopped him
From engaging in his nefarious activities
So this particular verse is very important to understand
What is the way to counteract the
Irreligious influence of this age of Kali
So Srila Prabha explains in the Purport in some detail
The personality of Godhead and his holy name qualities etc are all identical
This is very very important to understand
This is central point of our philosophy of Krishna consciousness
Krishna is absolutely divine and is the creator of heaven and earth
Krishna is absolute. Absolute means there is no difference at all between the person
Krishna and his name, his form, his qualities, his activities, his abode, his paraphernalia,
his pure devotees. All are identical. What does it mean they are all identical? The name
is as good as Krishna himself. Krishna is fully present in the sound vibration of his
name. This is very very important to understand.
When I say Krishna, that sound Krishna, two syllables. Krishna, two syllables. Rama. Hare.
Two syllables. In those two syllables Krishna is fully present with all his, Krishna means
Krishna with all his potencies.
the complete whole he is the absolute truth so Krishna is fully present in his
name he is fully present in the form the form of the deity in the temple Krishna
is fully present Krishna is fully present in his descriptions given in the
Bhagavatam Shukadeva Swami is describing Krishna in those
descriptions in those words
Krishna is fully present this is different from the material form
material name of a material personality for example take an ordinary person
some Deepak Sharma some gentleman now Deepak Sharma the person and his name
Deepak Sharma the two are completely different Deepak Sharma personality is
not present in the sound Deepak Sharma no
or let's take another example the substance water and the name water I
refer to the substance water as water by the name if I want water I may ask you
please give me a glass of water if I simply say water water water water water
water water water
that saying water is not going to quench my thirst because the name water or the
sound of the name water or the word water is different from the substance
water I have to actually drink water only then my thirst will be quenched
whereas Krishna is not like that you say Krishna you directly contact the
supreme person Krishna in full Krishna is fully present now we are not able to
perceive the presence of Krishna in his name or in his deity form we think this
name is just another sound like so many other sounds
material sounds no it is not or we think the deity in the temple is just a
statue made of wood or stone or metal we think it is just a representation
somebody believes that in the statue of Krishna there is Krishna they are
thinking that is Krishna no it's not what we think
you are not able to perceive the presence of Krishna in his name or in his body
it's not what we believe it is what actually is the fact Krishna is present
in the form of the deity because he's all-powerful he agrees to enter into
the deity form when Krishna is invited by the proper spiritual process of deity
installation that's a big subject I won't talk about that in the next lecture
I won't get into the details of that but in the deity Krishna is a present in
his transcendental form in the sound vibration of Hare Krishna Krishna is
present in his transcendental form with all his transcendental potencies Krishna
is fully present so therefore Srila Prabhupada
says the personality of Kali was not able to enter the jurisdiction of the
earth due to the presence of the personality of Godhead as long as Krishna
incarnated and he was present on the earth Kali could not enter and similarly
if there is an arrangement for the constant chanting of the holy names
qualities etc of the supreme personality of Godhead
there is no chance at all for a personality of Kali to enter
Even now, if we chant Hare Krishna, Hare Krishna, Krishna Krishna, Hare Hare, Hare Rama, Hare Rama, Rama Rama, Hare Hare, Kali cannot touch us.
Kali cannot enter our life. Kali cannot enter the jurisdiction of the place where such chanting goes on.
Where Srimad Bhagavatam is recited. Where Krishna is worshipped in his Deity form.
Where topics of Krishna are discussed by devotees. Where Krishna is remembered.
Where Krishna is glorified. Where Krishna is offered food and Prasadam is distributed.
Kali cannot influence. Kali cannot touch. Kali cannot enter. Kali cannot spread his influence.
That is the technique of driving away the personality of Kali from the world.
Now Kali is, Kali Yuga has begun, has started. Kali is present in this world.
But Kali cannot influence.
Even if it is not Kali.
Even if we use this technique of driving away Kali's influence by constant chanting Hare Krishna.
Or constantly engaging in different types of devotional service to Krishna.
By constantly remembering Krishna.
By constantly thinking of Krishna.
By constantly hearing about Krishna.
So many ways, so many ways one can remain immune to the influence of Kali.
In modernized human society there are great advancements of material science.
And they have invented the radio to distribute sound in the air.
Very good example Prabhupada is giving.
Now it is not just radio, it is also the television.
But when Prabhupada was writing this purport.
At that time the radio was there available everywhere.
Television was not available everywhere in all countries.
So Prabhupada is writing radio is spreading that sound everywhere.
So earlier they used to have what is called as a radio set.
They initially had a big set.
Then they had a pocket transistor or a pocket device.
Where you just switch on with a battery operated device.
And you can hear by tuning into some radio station.
Some music or some commentary or some news etc.
Exactly like now you can switch on a TV.
Which is connected through a dish antenna to the satellite.
Which is broadcasting some TV program from some channel.
All over the world it broadcasts.
And you catch that broadcast by dish antenna.
And you watch that program on a TV.
So instead of vibrating some nuisance sound for sense enjoyment.
If the state arranges to distribute transcendental sound.
By resounding the holy name, fame and activities of the Lord.
As they are authorized in the Bhagavad Gita or Srimad Bhagavatam.
Then a favorable condition will be created.
The principles of religion in the world will be reestablished.
And thus the executive heads who are so anxious to drive away corruption from the world.
Will be successful.
In the present age.
There is so much of corruption.
There is so much of evil influence.
Due to so much rampant sinful activities all over the world.
Everywhere.
But we can drive away this evil influence.
By broadcasting the holy name of the Supreme Lord.
The transcendental sound.
Through radio.
Through television.
Through satellite TV broadcasting.
Etc.
Nothing is bad if properly used for the service of the Lord.
There is radio, TV, all these things.
They are not bad by themselves.
If they are used properly.
If they are used for broadcasting the holy name of the Supreme Lord.
Chanting of the holy name.
Then that will be very very effective.
In driving away the evil influence of Kali.
In this age.
I will stop here.
Thank you very much.
Hare Krishna.
